brain_cerebrum_left.function: Processes sensory input and controls voluntary movement on the right side of the body

brain_cerebrum_right.function: Processes sensory input and controls voluntary movement on the left side of the body

brain_cerebellum.function: Coordinates balance, posture, and fine motor control

brainstem_midbrain.function: Relays auditory and visual signals; controls reflexes

brainstem_pons.function: Connects cerebellum to cerebrum; regulates breathing rhythm

brainstem_medulla.function: Controls heart rate, respiration, and autonomic functions

spinal_cord_cervical.function: Transmits signals to and from the neck and forelimbs

spinal_cord_thoracic.function: Controls trunk muscles and thoracic organs

spinal_cord_sacral.function: Controls pelvic organs and tail movement

spinal_cord_caudal.function: Transmits signals to the tail and caudal structures

nasal_conchae_ventral.function: Filters and directs airflow through nasal cavity

nasal_septum.function: Separates left and right nasal passages

pharynx_nasopharynx.function: Conducts air from nasal cavity to pharynx

pharynx_laryngopharynx.function: Connects pharynx to larynx and esophagus

larynx_epiglottis.function: Prevents food from entering the trachea during swallowing

larynx_thyroid_cartilage.function: Protects vocal cords and supports larynx

larynx_cricoid_cartilage.function: Forms the base of the larynx and maintains airway patency

larynx_arytenoid_cartilage.function: Controls vocal cord tension and movement

trachea_rings.function: Keep the trachea open during respiration

trachea_carina.function: Bifurcation point of the trachea into bronchi

lung_left_cranial.function: Performs gas exchange in the cranial region

lung_left_caudal.function: Performs gas exchange in the caudal region

lung_right_cranial.function: Performs gas exchange in the cranial region

lung_right_middle.function: Performs gas exchange in the middle region

lung_right_caudal.function: Performs gas exchange in the caudal region

lung_right_accessory.function: Supports ventilation in the mediastinal region

renal_medulla.function: Concentrates urine through tubules and loops

renal_pelvis.function: Collects urine before it enters the ureter

renal_hilus.function: Entry and exit point for vessels, nerves, and ureter

ureter_left.function: Transports urine from kidney to bladder

ureter_right.function: Transports urine from kidney to bladder

bladder_apex.function: Top portion of the bladder; expands during filling

bladder_neck.function: Controls outflow of urine into urethra

urethra_female.function: Conducts urine from bladder to exterior in females

urethra_male.function: Conducts urine and semen from bladder to exterior in males

oviduct_left.function: Transports ova from ovary to uterus

oviduct_right.function: Transports ova from ovary to uterus

uterine_horns.function: Site of embryo implantation and development

uterine_body.function: Connects horns to cervix; supports fetal growth

cervix.function: Barrier between uterus and vagina; opens during parturition

vagina_body.function: Receives penis during copulation; birth canal

vestibule.function: Common passage for urine and reproductive tract

vas_deferens_left.function: Carries sperm from epididymis to urethra

vas_deferens_right.function: Carries sperm from epididymis to urethra

seminal_vesicle.function: Adds fluid to semen for nourishment

prostate.function: Adds enzymes and fluid to semen; supports sperm motility

bulbourethral_gland.function: Secretes mucus to lubricate urethra before ejaculation

penis_body.function: Conducts urine and semen through urethra

penis_glans.function: Sensitive tip of penis; involved in copulation

pituitary_gland.function: Master gland; regulates growth, metabolism, and reproduction

parathyroid_glands.function: Regulate blood calcium and phosphate levels

adrenal_gland_left.function: Produces stress hormones and regulates metabolism

adrenal_gland_right.function: Produces stress hormones and regulates metabolism

pancreatic_islets.function: Secrete insulin and glucagon to regulate blood sugar

ovarian_follicles.function: Develop and release ova; produce estrogen

eye_left.function: Receives visual input from the left field of view

eye_right.function: Receives visual input from the right field of view

retina_left.function: Converts light into neural signals for vision

retina_right.function: Converts light into neural signals for vision

optic_nerve_left.function: Transmits visual signals from left eye to brain

optic_nerve_right.function: Transmits visual signals from right eye to brain

ear_external_left.function: Captures sound waves and directs them inward

ear_inner_left.function: Detects sound and balance via cochlea and vestibular system

ear_external_right.function: Captures sound waves and directs them inward

ear_inner_right.function: Detects sound and balance via cochlea and vestibular system

olfactory_bulb.function: Processes smell signals from nasal cavity

taste_buds_tongue.function: Detects taste stimuli (sweet, sour, salty, bitter)

tongue_body.function: Manipulates food and aids in vocalization
